DOC.brief_summary: To evaluate healthy volunteer safety immune response 200 mcg gp120 candidate vaccine MF59 emulsion without MTP-PE 0 , 1 6 month . Preliminary evaluation two dose level gp120 administer volunteer protocol VEU 007A indicate gp120 dose potentially great immunogenicity may interest .
DOC.brief_title: A Phase I Clinical Trial Evaluate Safety Immunogenicity 200 Mcg gp120 ( CHO ) BIOCINE MF59 Emulsion Versus Emulsion Control : Three Injections 0 , 1 , 6 Months
DOC.detailed_description: Preliminary evaluation two dose level gp120 administer volunteer protocol VEU 007A indicate gp120 dose potentially great immunogenicity may interest . Ten healthy volunteer receive 200 mcg gp120 MF59 emulsion , four volunteer receive placebo consist MF59 emulsion PBS vehicle . Injections give month 0 , 1 , 6 . Patients follow 12 month follow third injection .
DOC.criteria: Inclusion Criteria Subjects must : Normal history physical exam . Negative ELISA HIV . Normal cellmediated immune response use Merieux skin test . Normal urinalysis . Exclusion Criteria Coexisting Condition : Subjects follow condition exclude : Evidence psychological psychiatric problem may lead noncompliance study requirement . Positive syphilis serology . If serology document false positive due remote ( > 6 month ) treat infection , subject eligible . Circulating hepatitis B surface antigen . Subjects follow prior condition exclude : History immunodeficiency , chronic illness , autoimmune disease , use immunosuppressive medication . History anaphylaxis adverse reaction vaccine . Prior Medication : Excluded : Prior HIV vaccine . Immunoglobulins vaccine within past 3 month . Experimental agent within past 30 day . Prior Treatment : Excluded : Blood transfusion cryoprecipitates within past 3 month . Identifiable highrisk behavior HIV infection , include : Any history intravenous ( IV ) drug use within past year . Syphilis , gonorrhea , sexually transmit disease ( include chlamydia pelvic inflammatory disease ) past 6 month . More two sexual partner , sexual contact highrisk partner , past 6 month .
